title: "link zipcode with neighbourhood"
author: "Leiyu Yue"
date: "12/1/2017"
output: html_document
---


```{r}
rest_neighbourhood = left_join(rest_inspection, zip_code_xml, by = "zip_codes")

##calculating percentage neighbourhood is na
mean(is.na(rest_neighbourhood$neighborhood))
##taking out distinct zipcodes with missing neighbourhood name
rest_neighbourhood %>% 
  select(zip_codes, neighborhood) %>% 
  filter(is.na(neighborhood)) %>% 
  distinct()
```
